domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
During Joe Biden’s roundtable in Philadelphia he: 
- stumbled through basic historical facts,
- refused to acknowledge his much publicized opposition to fracking,
- stayed mute on support for our police,
- AND failed to explain why he’s weeks late to the recovery effort.
